name: Hash Brown Set Meal
description:
Hash Brown loves you <3

This is a parkour game about hash browns.

You're a cute catgirl, and you're going to do everything you can to get your dream: Crunchy hash browns.

Thanks to our most reliable gameplay programmer @cuoshen, talented game music producer @audiokid, and cute looking game artist @amonlluy.

We finished the game in two days, hope you like it <3
